title: Silver Haze
description: Daughter of a Sessions Judge and wife of a Principal of a prestigious college, she had an eventful life and ends up with Dementia and Alzheimer's. Her son has written this narrative describing how women lived and managed in educated families in the 20th Century in North India.The story starts in the city of Campbellpur, now Attock in Pakistan and goes on to Lahore, Agra and Amritsar before she settled down after marriage in the City of Ludhiana in Punjab
author: Pankaj Varma
